sentences.en: " Practice makes perfect. " is a proverb.
sentences.cn: “ 熟能生巧 ” 是一句谚语.

sentences.en: A proverb distils the wisdom of ages.
sentences.cn: 谚语是许多世纪智慧的精华.

sentences.en: A proverb is the wisdom of men and the wit of one.
sentences.cn: 谚语是众人的智慧,也体现个人的机智.

sentences.en: An old Arab proverb says, "The enemy of my enemy is my friend."
sentences.cn: 有一句古老的阿拉伯谚语说：“我敌人的敌人是我的朋友。”

sentences.en: Don't you know the old proverb?'save your breath to cool your porridge !'
sentences.cn: 多吃饭,少开口:你们不晓得这句老 古话 么 ?

sentences.en: He is fickle to a proverb.
sentences.cn: 他的任性是人所共知的.

sentences.en: Hope for the best, prepare for the worst. ( proverb )
sentences.cn: 往最好处着想, 作最坏的打算 ( 谚 ).

sentences.en: It has passed into a proverb.
That proverb is apposite to this case.
sentences.cn: 那谚语切合于这个情形.

sentences.en: The second half of that proverb will hold no longer.
sentences.cn: 这句谚语的后半句不再有用了.

sentences.en: There is a proverb with reference to the killing of cats.
sentences.cn: 有一句关于葬送了猫的性命的谚语.

sentences.en: They were ridiculous even to a proverb.
This is a proverb and you ought to stick it down and learn it by heart.
sentences.cn: 这是条谚语,你得把它抄下来记熟.

sentences.en: You know the old proverb ,'Call a maid by a married name.'
sentences.cn: 你该知道张冠李戴这句成语. ”

sentences.en: Your proverb is apt, dear Edward.
sentences.cn: 你那句谚语说得恰如其分, 亲爱的爱德华.

words.tran_cn: 谚语的；众所周知的；谚语式的

trans.tran_cn: 谚语，格言，话柄，笑柄，人人知道的事情，有名的事情，俚谚剧，俚谚游戏
trans.tran_en: a short well-known statement that gives advice or expresses something that is generally true. ‘A penny saved is a penny earned’ is an example of a proverb.
